definition[0]: relating to the study of ideas, especially scientific ideas, rather than to practical uses of the ideas or practical experience

definition[1]: a theoretical situation or condition could exist but does not really exist
example[3]: Equality between men and women in our society is still only theoretical.
example[4]: a theoretical risk of an explosion
